title: Drawing, "Apollo Guards the Herds [or Flocks] of King Admetus", 1780–1800
title_raw: Apollo Guards the Herds [or Flocks] of King Admetus
medium: Pencil, pen and black ink, brush and watercolors on paper.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Horizontal Rectangle. Seated, he plays the lyre. The dog and thecastle are at right. Caption, on top written with black chalk: 3 in a hexagon. For the Teatro Della Concordia, Jesi says Cavina, Vol II, p. 813, AI, 278.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Apollo Guards the Herds [or Flocks] of King Admetus", 1780–1800. Pencil, pen and black ink, brush and watercolors on paper.. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-3236.
